item.description:
Get full of beer and blarney tonight.
Special Irish menu that night and Irish beer selections.
Wear something GREEN!

Irish door prizes!

Deadline to RSVP is Thursday, March 15th.

We'll have small tables of 4-6 each to alleviate the check calculating fiasco and for better conversation.

Meet in the lobby of the restaurant. Look for me wearing a Green Hat.

Directions from Hartford:
I 84 E to exit 63. Get in left lane.
At end of exit turn LEFT onto Tolland Tpke.
The restaurant is on the LEFT in front of Kohl's.
Plenty of parking!

From North of Manchester:
I 84 W to Exit 64.
At end of exit turn RIGHT.
Just before lite, take RIGHT onto Tolland Tpke.
Restaurant is 1 mile up road on the RIGHT in front of Kohl's.

From Springfield, Ma:
I 91 S to I 291 S via exit 35A (Manchester);
Merge onto I 84 E via exit on Left toward Boston;
Take exit 63. Get in left lane.
Take LEFT onto Tolland Tpke.
Restaurant is on LEFT in front of Kohl's.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Irish Dinner on St. Patrick's Day
